decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: [111 Revision A, 112, Site Location Plan]

Condition : 3 - Matching Materials - The facing materials used in the development hereby permitted shall match those of the existing building in materials, style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.

Condition : 4 - Construction Times - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 5 - Materials to be Approved - No relevant part of the development shall take place until details of the 2nd floor window frame (notwithstanding any materials specified in the application form and/or the approved drawings), has been submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval. No works which are the subject of this condition shall be carried out until the details are approved, and the development shall be carried out in full accordance with theapproved details.

Condition : 6 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:
   i) Plans were amended during the applciation process.
description: ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH FRENCH DOORS, A JULIET BALOCNY AT SECOND FLOOR LEVEL AND REMOVAL OF REAR CHIMNEY POTS TO THE STACK ON THE OUTRIGGER.
